titles.title: Medicare Beneficiaries' Choice Protection Act of 1999
To amend part C of title XVIII to provide for an improved methodology for the calculation of Medicare+Choice payment rates.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 11/9/1999--Introduced. Medicare Beneficiaries' Choice Protection Act of 1999 - Amends part C (Medicare+Choice) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for establishment of a payment floor for Medicare+Choice payment rates after applying a specified risk-adjustment methodology.
